mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rx_id AS "rxId", a.department_id AS "departmentId", a.product_id AS "productId", (select image1 from `zhenghe_common_image` where `relevance_id` = a.id limit 1) imgUrl, a.product_name AS "productName", a.price AS "price", a.num AS "num", a.standard AS "standard", a.sig AS "sig", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator"
LEFT JOIN zhenghe_rx b ON b.id = a.rx_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o3 ON o3.id = a.department_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_rx_detail a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_rx_detail( id, rx_id, department_id, product_id, product_name, price, num, standard, sig, create_date, delete_mark, remark, update_date, mender, creator ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rxId}, #{departmentId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{num}, #{standard}, #{sig}, #{createDate}, #{deleteMark}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{mender}, #{creator} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zhenghe_rx_detail SET rx_id = #{rxId}, department_id = #{departmentId}, product_id = #{productId}, product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, num = #{num}, standard = #{standard}, sig = #{sig}, delete_mark = #{deleteMark}, remark = #{remark}, update_date = #{updateDate}, mender = #{mender}, creator = #{creator} WHERE id = #{id}
